description: [``botocore``] This is the initial SDK release for AWS Control Catalog, a central catalog for AWS managed controls. This release includes 3 new APIs - ListDomains, ListObjectives, and ListCommonControls - that vend high-level data to categorize controls across the AWS platform.
[``botocore``] Added USE_SOURCE as default option to LaunchConfigurationTemplate bootMode parameter.
[``botocore``] Updated the allowed monitorName length for CloudWatch Network Monitor.
